echo "1 create a md file of implementing provided feature 2 if implementation longer than 20 minutes than subtasks"
echo "3 each subtask include relevant file path 4 long term support rather than short term gain"
echo "5. Ensure the implementation is well-documented and includes relevant file paths for future reference"
echo "6. Include unit tests for the new functionality, specifying the relevant file paths for test cases"
